from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d import Axes3D
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # plotting
import numpy as np # linear algebra
import os # accessing directory structure
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import seaborn as sns
source.ce1870fc:
df1 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/cve.csv')
df1.dataframeName = 'cve.csv'
nRow, nCol = df1.shape
print(f'There are {nRow} rows and {nCol} columns')
df1 = df1.dropna(axis=0)
source.dce1ddff:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))

sns.kdeplot(data=df1['cvss'], shade=True)

plt.ylabel('Density')
plt.xlabel('CVSS score')
source.2f1bd8cd:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))


sns.distplot(a=df1['cwe_code'], kde=False)
plt.xticks([0, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900, 1000])
plt.xlabel('Common Weakness Enumeration Code')
plt.ylabel('Total number of times CWE code was identified')
